definition: to create/original creation/to be the first to do sth
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: The process is named for Louis Pasteur, its originator.
sentences.chinese: 首创者是巴斯德，并以其姓氏命名。

sentences.english: The comb-type caisson is a new structural type of breakwaters.
sentences.chinese: 梳式防波堤是一种新型直立防波堤，国内外属首创。

sentences.english: First pure water using domestic cleaning process, to ensure the quality of organic products.
sentences.chinese: 采用国内首创纯净水清洗工艺，确保产品的有机品质。

sentences.english: The continuing education system for teachers was first established by Buddha Shakyamuni.
sentences.chinese: 教师进修的制度是释迦牟尼佛首创的。

sentences.english: Britain was the first country in Western world to establish the cabinet system.
sentences.chinese: 英国是西方世界首创内阁制的国家。

sentences.english: Beading and embroidery products first computer automatically, high efficiency at reasonable prices.
sentences.chinese: 首创电脑自动钉珠刺绣产品，效率高价格平。

sentences.english: Therefore, the stain-less steel hip flask adopts argon arc welding technique, it is the initiate of home.
sentences.chinese: 其中，不锈钢酒壶采用氩弧焊工艺，系国内首创。

sentences.english: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
sentences.chinese: 他首创了被称为额叶切断术的外科手术。

sentences.english: That is, the thought of cooperativeness initiated by Lenin.
sentences.chinese: 这就是列宁首创的合作制思想。

sentences.english: The two technologies adopted by the invention are domestic first and reach an advanced level in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这两项技术国内首创在国际上已处于领先水平。

sentences.english: The application of rare-earth fertilizers in the agriculture was firstly suggested with Chinese scientists.
sentences.chinese: 稀土微肥在农业上的应用，为我国科学家首创。

sentences.english: Glass - body painted enamel is a handicraft originated in China.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃胎画珐琅为我国首创的工艺品种。

sentences.english: "CHINDIA" was first created by an Indian friend, Lanmishi.
sentences.chinese: “CHINDIA”是由印度友人兰密施首创的。

sentences.english: Oxygen enriching membranes are first prepared from room temperature thermotropic cholesteric liquid crystal and ethyl cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 首创了室温热致胆甾液晶与乙基纤维素共混富氧膜。

sentences.english: The first large-scale original pieces of modern music, Blue-ray Water drum.
sentences.chinese: 大型首创原创现代鼓乐曲目《风尚男子蓝光鼓》。

sentences.english: The device is designed successfully for the first time in china and of high performance price ratio.
sentences.chinese: 该装置为国内首创，具有很高的性能价格比。

definition: priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
first (hotel of its type, store of its type etc)
the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
to regard as the foremost/to name as a prime example/to implement for the first time
to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom)/to arise at an opportune time/able to take advantage of an opportunity/to rise to the occasion
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to draw into/to pull into/to introduce
